sentences.en: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.cn: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.en: As our glasses touched, he said ‘Cheers!’
sentences.cn: 我们的酒杯相碰时，他说了声:“干杯！”

sentences.en: ask someone to &B{put} you &B{in touch} with other carers.
sentences.cn: 请别人帮你联系其他护理人员。

sentences.en: Farmers are increasingly losing touch with their instinct for managing the land.
sentences.cn: 农民正在逐渐丢失经营土地的本领。

sentences.en: he seems surprisingly out of touch with recent economic thinking.
sentences.cn: 令人惊讶的是，他似乎不了解近来的经济思想。

sentences.en: Her dress was so long that it was touching the ground.
sentences.cn: 她的裙子很长，都拖到地上了。

sentences.en: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.cn: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.en: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world. 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。
sentences.cn: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.en: I &B{lost touch with} him when he joined the Air Force.
sentences.cn: 自他加入空军后，我便与他失去了联系。

sentences.en: I hated this man, his very touch made my skin crawl.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌这个男人，他碰我一下我都觉得恶心。

sentences.en: I'mdefinitely going to get in touch with these people.
sentences.cn: 我肯定会跟这些人取得联系。

sentences.en: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.cn: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.en: In my job one tends to lose touch with friends.
sentences.cn: 干我这行，往往会与朋友失去联系。

sentences.en: It was touch and go whether we'd go bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 我们是否会破产还很难说。

sentences.en: Mr Cavazos' problem was that he was out of touch.
sentences.cn: 卡瓦佐斯先生的问题是他不了解最新形势。

sentences.en: Now is the time to touch him for a loan.
sentences.cn: 现在是向他借笔钱的时候了。

sentences.en: Pamela was an easy touch when she needed some cash.
sentences.cn: 她缺钱花的时候，帕梅拉总是有求必应。

sentences.en: Royal Ballerina was touched off by Intrepidity in the English Oaks.
sentences.cn: 在英国欧克斯马赛中无畏马险胜皇家芭蕾舞女马。

sentences.en: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

sentences.en: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.cn: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.en: she said that you &B{kept in touch}, that you wrote.
sentences.cn: 她说你保持了联系，还写了信。

sentences.en: She thought she just had a touch of flu.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己仅仅有点感冒。

sentences.en: So is there any taboo she wouldn't touch? Unhesitatingly she replies, "Politics."
sentences.cn: 那么有什么她不愿触及的禁忌吗？她毫不犹豫地回答：“政治。”

sentences.en: the ankle was swollen and painful to the touch.
sentences.cn: 脚踝肿了，一摸就疼。

sentences.en: the ankle was swollen and painful to the touch.
sentences.cn: 脚踝肿了，一摸就疼。

sentences.en: The dishes he produces all have a personal touch.
sentences.cn: 他做的菜全都带有其个人风格。

sentences.en: the silk was slightly rough to the touch.
sentences.cn: 这种丝摸起来有点粗糙。

sentences.en: the silk was slightly rough to the touch.
sentences.cn: 这种丝摸起来有点粗糙。

sentences.en: The striker was unable to find his scoring touch.
sentences.cn: 那个前锋找不到进球的感觉。

sentences.en: the water was a touch chilly for us.
sentences.cn: 对于我们来说，水有点冰。

sentences.en: Their leaders have lost touch with what is happening in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们的领导人不再了解该国正发生的一切。

sentences.en: They run it with a truly professional but personal touch.
sentences.cn: 他们的经营既有真正的专业水准又不乏个人特色。

sentences.en: Use a light touch when applying cream or make-up.
sentences.cn: 涂抹乳霜或化妆品时动作要轻。

sentences.en: we cannot &B{lose touch with} political reality.
sentences.cn: 我们不能脱离政治现实。

sentences.en: we need to keep in touch with the latest developments.
sentences.cn: 我们应该紧跟最新发展。

sentences.en: when you fancy a touch of the sun and some sea air, you can head for the beach.
sentences.cn: 当你向往日光和海边空气时，你可以去海滩。

sentences.en: when you fancy a touch of the sun and some sea air, you can head for the beach.
sentences.cn: 当你向往日光和海边空气时，你可以去海滩。

sentences.en: when you fancy a touch of the sun and some sea air, you can head for the beach.
sentences.cn: 当你向往日光和海边空气时，你可以去海滩。

words.tran_cn: 可触的；可使感动的；可食用的
触摸（touch的过去式和过去分词）
接触；[生理]触觉；格调；少许

phrases.tran_cn: 最后一触，最后一笔；最后润色
轻触；低干涉（一种经营模式）
第一次接触（英国女子组合甜心宝贝的专辑）
缺乏对当前事件和发展的了解

phrases.phrase: would not touch something with a bargepole

trans.tran_cn: 碰，触（觉），修饰，风格，手法，一点，些许
trans.tran_en: the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

trans.tran_cn: 碰，（使）接触，感动，吃，喝，用，影响，比得上，达到，涉及，共事，闪现，伤害
trans.tran_en: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
to affect someone’s emotions, especially by making them feel sympathy or sadness
